prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that haunts ancient ruins and wears a mysterious mask.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a shadowy figure, with a haunting presence and eerie abilities.
Generate a spooky creature with a flowing, ghostly form and a connection to the spirit world.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of lost souls, featuring an ancient artifact as part of its design.
Imagine a ghostly entity that roams graveyards, cloaked in darkness and carrying a sorrowful tale.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of ancient history and ghostly apparitions, with unique visual traits.
Show me a spectral Pokemon with distinct features that symbolize its connection to the afterlife.
